about_the_game:
The Deluxe Pack provides more insight in the world of Death end re;Quest 2, including art, wallpapers, theme, and the official soundtrack!

The Deluxe Pack Includes:
・ 26 pg PC Digital Art Book including concept art and illustrations
・ 6x PC Wallpapers (3x resolutions per design)
・ Original Digital Soundtrack (24 tracks)
・ PC Desktop Theme
detailed_description:
The Deluxe Pack provides more insight in the world of Death end re;Quest 2, including art, wallpapers, theme, and the official soundtrack!

The Deluxe Pack Includes:
・ 26 pg PC Digital Art Book including concept art and illustrations
・ 6x PC Wallpapers (3x resolutions per design)
・ Original Digital Soundtrack (24 tracks)
・ PC Desktop Theme
name: Death end re;Quest 2 - Deluxe Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Death end re;Quest 2 - Deluxe Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Deluxe Pack includes: Digital Art Book, PC Wallpapers, Theme, and OST!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
